title: Independence day (Special edition)
creator_contributor_role: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture trailers
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Life on other planets
description: As massive alien spaceships settle over major cities throughout the globe, all of the Earth's citizens gaze in wonder at the seemingly benign visitors - until the aliens begin blasting destructive beams and destroying cities in their wake. Now the world's only hope rests on the shoulders of a handful of determined survivors uniting for one last strike against the invaders - to save mankind and reclaim their independence. This is an extended version of the original film and includes an alternate ending, two documentaries: "Creating Reality" and "The Making of ID4" and the original theatrical trailer.
